Package fr.sii.ogham.testing.assertion.sms

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssertSms
    Utility class for checking if the received SMS content is as expected.
    ExpectedAddressedPhoneNumber  
    ExpectedSms
    Class used in tests for ensuring that the SMS is respected.
    FluentOptionalParameterAssert<P>
    Make assertions on optional parameters of a SubmitSm.
    FluentPduRequestAssert<P,S extends SubmitSm>
    Make assertions on received PDU.
    FluentPhoneNumberAssert<P>
    Make assertions on phone number of received messages.
    FluentReceivedSmsAssert<S extends SubmitSm>
    Make assertions on received messages
    FluentShortMessageMessageAssert<P,S extends SubmitSm>
    Make assertions on short_message field.
    FluentSmsAssert<P,S extends SubmitSm>
    Make assertions on particular message.
    FluentSmsListAssert<P,S extends SubmitSm>
    Make assertions on received messages
    OptionalParameterWithContext
    Dedicated context for one particular optional parameter (identified by the tag).
    PduRequestWithContext<S extends SubmitSm>
    Dedicated context for one particular SubmitSm
    PhoneNumberInfo
    Represents a phone number with TypeOfNumber and NumberingPlanIndicator information.
    PhoneNumberWithContext
    Context dedicated to a phone number of a particular message.
    ShortMessageWithContext<S extends SubmitSm>
    Context dedicated to the short_message field of a SubmitSm.
    SplitSms
    Represents a SMS that has been split into several parts in order to be sent.
